statements: SELECT id, operation, timestamp, user_id, data FROM audit_log;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE operation = 'INSERT' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT operation, COUNT(*) AS total_operations FROM audit_log GROUP BY operation;
SELECT operation, timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' AS est_timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE operation = 'DELETE';
SELECT id, operation, timestamp, user_id, data FROM audit_log WHERE operation = 'CREATE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT operation, COUNT(*) AS operation_count FROM audit_log GROUP BY operation ORDER BY operation_count DESC
SELECT operation, user_id, to_char(timestamp, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS formatted_timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE operation = 'DELETE'
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE data @> '{"key": "value"}' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action, username FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'Update';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, username FROM audit_log WHERE username LIKE 'Admin%';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action, table_name FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_details WHERE old_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT action, username, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE table_name = 'users' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE username = 'admin' AND table_name = 'products';
SELECT a.log_id, a.timestamp, a.action, ad.old_value, ad.new_value FROM audit_log a INNER JOIN audit_details ad ON a.log_id = ad.log_id;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM audit_log WHERE action LIKE 'UPDATE%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, action FROM audit_log WHERE id = 1
SELECT data FROM user_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT username, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, old_data, new_data FROM data_changes WHERE change_id = 12345 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, username, action, timestamp FROM audit_log;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, action FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, old_data, new_data FROM data_changes WHERE change_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND timestamp < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM user_data ud JOIN data_changes dc ON ud.id = dc.change_id WHERE dc.new_data LIKE '%important%' AND dc.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_changes WHERE new_value != old_value;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_timestamp FROM audit_log GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT table_name, change_type, change_timestamp FROM data_changes WHERE change_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT action, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT table_name, last_audit_timestamp FROM tables_audited WHERE last_audit_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND created_at > '2021-01-01'
SELECT change_id, table_name, change_type FROM data_changes ORDER BY change_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT table_name, last_audit_timestamp FROM tables_audited WHERE last_audit_timestamp IS NOT NULL
SELECT audit_log_table, audit_level FROM audit_config WHERE enabled = true
